photovault-mcp-server.name: photovault-mcp-server
photovault-mcp-server.description: Model Context Protocol server for PhotoVault photo management application - deploy, manage, and monitor your photo vault with AI assistance
photovault-mcp-server.author: Akhil Sai Latchireddi

tools.name: deploy_backend
tools.description: Deploy PhotoVault backend to AWS Lambda using Serverless Framework

tools.name: deploy_frontend
tools.description: Deploy PhotoVault frontend to GitHub Pages

tools.name: setup_aws_infrastructure
tools.description: Set up AWS infrastructure (S3, IAM, SSM) for PhotoVault

tools.name: configure_auth0
tools.description: Generate Auth0 configuration settings for PhotoVault

tools.name: run_tests
tools.description: Run frontend and backend tests with optional coverage reporting

tools.name: manage_secrets
tools.description: Manage AWS SSM Parameter Store secrets for PhotoVault

tools.name: check_deployment_status
tools.description: Check the status of PhotoVault deployments

tools.name: analyze_costs
tools.description: Analyze AWS costs and usage for PhotoVault infrastructure

tools.name: generate_feature_docs
tools.description: Generate documentation templates for new PhotoVault features

tools.name: backup_database
tools.description: Create backup instructions and scripts for MongoDB database
